greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n,k) * binomial(n+k,k) * (-n)^(n-k).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..386
formula: a(n) = n! * [x^n] exp((2 - n)*x) * BesselI(0,2*sqrt(1 - n)*x).
mathematica: Join[{1}, Table[Sum[Binomial[n, k] Binomial[n + k, k] (-n)^(n - k), {k, 0, n}], {n, 1, 19}]]
Table[n! SeriesCoefficient[Exp[(2 - n) x] BesselI[0, 2 Sqrt[1 - n] x], {x, 0, n}], {n, 0, 19}]
program: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=0, n, binomial(n,k)^2*(1-n)^k); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 01 2020
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, May 31 2020
